mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where user_id = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pass, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, user_email, user_grade, user_wcnt, interest, joindate) values(#{user_id},#{user_pass},#{user_phone1},#{user_phone2},#{user_phone3},#{user_email},#{user_grade},#{user_wcnt},#{interest},sysdate())
